channel.title: Help with adding webclient to site (Already Set Up)
channel.description: I downloaded a set up webclient to start off but i dont know how to add it to a freewebs site. If anyone has any ideas I beg that you tell me, I will give you credits on website

item.description:

ok thx, i got it but when i try to go to it on my website it just has a red x in the top, and i have the latest version of java

item.title: Help with adding webclient to site (Already Set Up)
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

Heres the HTML code.

<applet name="##" width="##" height="##" archive="##" code="##">

Of course you need to replace the ‘##’ appropriately…

  • Applet name: Name of your applet.
  • Width: The width you wish the applet to be.
  • Height: The height you wish the applet to be.
  • Archive: The directory of your jarred client.
  • Code: The main class of your client (I’m assuming it is client.java so you would declare it as client).

Read full topic
item.source: Help with adding webclient to site (Already Set Up)
